parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language used by the user.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on per page. Maximum value: **20**. Default value: **5**.

parameters.name: RecoveryPlanId
parameters.description: The ID of the disaster recovery plan that you want to preview.
